```{r}
Mtable = read.csv("D:/Jazz_visual/csv/Musician_table.csv", row.names = 1)[c(-5,-72,-107,-182,-205,-219,-224),]
write.csv(Mtable, 'D:/jazz_visual/csv/Mtable229.csv', na = '')
```

```{r}
genre = as.data.frame(Mtable$genre)
colnames(genre) = 'genre'
rownames(genre) = rownames(Mtable)
```

# Genre
```{r}
genre_split = token_split(genre, g=1)
```

```{r}
genre_ohe = oh_encoding(genre, tok = genre_split$token_list1)
```

```{r}
genre_matrix = genre_ohe$token_matrix

for(i in 1:nrow(genre_matrix)){
  sum_mu = sum(genre_matrix[i,])
  if(sum_mu>1){
    print(sprintf("Multivalue in %s, value: %s", i, sum_mu))
  }
}
```
